resources.string:
"Description - A Network Management tool developed on Android platform which communicates with the local NMS server for performing network management functions. After creating a connection with the local NMS server, it enables user to perform several operations such as network discovery, service provisioning/de-provisioning, firmware upgrade etc. Offline network planning is also supported for ECR router family.
Specifications:
1. Built for tablets with Android version 4.4 and above"
